title: Menage and More
description: Seven Scorching Erotic Stories To Keep You Hot All Holiday Season!The ultimate collection of Ménage, Kink and Taboo from Bianca James*** Includes two threesome stories previously considered too erotic for publication ***Interview with the BillionairesAlpha MMFPreviously unpublished due to its disturbing themes and explicit sexual content.A job interview like no other. A young girl looking for a way to pay her college tuition and two smoldering hot billionaires with voracious appetites.Birthday Desires (from the Alexis by Night trilogy)MFFAlexis enjoys a wild and steamy evening helping a married couple live out their fantasy of a raunchy, no limits and sizzling hot ménage et trois.SnatchedAlpha MFMMPreviously unpublished due to its disturbing themes and explicit sexual content.*** Synopsis has been censored ***Triple Delight (from the Awakening Sophy series)Alpha MMFIt began as a friendly dinner invitation from her neighbors. Craig, the hot, investment banker and his old college buddy, Luke, the bodybuilding, muscle car driving, inked parolee. Midnight Ménage (from the Awakening Sophy series)MFFA girls only night, Sophy and her hot blond friend, Maddie. A few drinks and a few laughs. Well, that was the plan. Then Craig, the hot Investment Banker from next door pays a visit ...More Triple Delight (from the Awakening Sophy series)Alpha MMFSophy thought she had satisfied the carnal urges of her two hot as hell neighbors. But they were just warming up for the main event.Feet Treat (from the Alexis by Night trilogy)Scorching hot foot fetish storyA little bit of kink to finish the collection with something naughty and different.This 50,000 word collection is recommended for 18+ due to mature and disturbing themes and explicit sexual content
author: Bianca  James
